name: App with Espresso Testing
body:
# Overview:
Show the usage of the testing library **"espresso"**.

## Code:
A test is just as simple as ...
```java
public void testSimpleClickAndCheckText() {
        onView(withId(R.id.button_simple))
                .perform(click());

        onView(withId(R.id.text_simple))
                .check(matches(withText("Hello Espresso!")));
    }
```

## References:

   Espresso project: https://code.google.com/p/android-test-kit/
